brand_info.name: Saucony
brand_info.positioning: A heritage performance running brand focused on authentic running culture, technical innovation, and the emotional connection between runners and the act of running.
brand_info.vision: To be the most authentic running brand in the world.
brand_info.mission: Inspire and serve runners through innovation, craftsmanship, and a deep respect for the running community.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1898 in Kutztown, Pennsylvania, Saucony began along Saucony Creek and has evolved into one of the oldest running-specific brands, rooted in craftsmanship, fit, and performance innovation.

brand_values.brand_promise: Deliver reliable, innovative running products that respect the runner, the craft, and the planet.
differentiators: One of the longest-standing brands dedicated exclusively to running.
Strong balance between performance technology and classic design language.
Deep emotional storytelling around the runner’s journey rather than podium results.
Commitment to sustainability and responsible innovation under the 'Run For Good' platform.
non_negotiables: Stay authentic to running culture and runner-first thinking.
Protect technical credibility across road and trail categories.
Keep communication honest, humble, and human.
Avoid trend-driven dilution outside core running.

psychographics.lifestyle: Dedicated runners ranging from casual joggers to competitive athletes who value feel, fit, and consistency over hype.
psychographics.behavior: Regular training routines, loyalty to trusted models, interest in shoe rotation, appreciation for thoughtful storytelling.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Runner-to-runner, reflective and encouraging, blending technical clarity with emotional resonance.

logo.usage_rules: Maintain clarity and contrast; avoid distortion or excessive effects.
logo.lockup_behavior: Wordmark and wave used together or separately depending on context; ensure recognizability.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'S' in the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Clean performance palette with restrained use of accent color; seasonal palettes remain grounded.

typography.primary_font: Modern sans-serif with classic athletic tone
typography.secondary_font: Bold sans-serif for emphasis and campaign lines

preferred_photographers: Lifestyle photographers capturing real training moments
Studio product photographers emphasizing form and durability
style.camera_feel: Honest, intimate imagery capturing rhythm, effort, and reflection.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural running strides, recovery moments, quiet determination.
style.casting_attitude: Real runners of diverse backgrounds and abilities.

technical.lighting: Natural daylight or soft overcast conditions; clean studio lighting for product.
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; focus on runner and product clarity.
technical.color_grading: Natural, slightly muted tones for realism.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Ride, fit, and durability cues clearly visible.

motion_rules.pacing: Measured and rhythmic, aligned with steady running cadence.

visual_dos: Show real runners in real contexts

platform_behavior.Instagram: Runner stories, community highlights, thoughtful product moments
platform_behavior.Website: Product education, sustainability, and training guidance

print.cover_rules: Human-scale running imagery with restrained copy
